abstract: Henry Blodget, the former Internet analyst, is taking some pride from a little-noticed milestone: For the first time since he agreed to be barred from the securities industry, shares of Amazon have risen back above $400.
lead_paragraph: Henry Blodget, the former Internet analyst, is taking some pride from a little-noticed milestone: For the first time since he agreed to be barred from the securities industry, shares of Amazon have risen back above $400.

headline.main: Blodget’s Fateful Amazon Call Comes True Again
